about_the_game: From the distant future comes the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Cyborg Personalization Pack, fully-loaded with an electrotech-themed weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new Calling Card. (NOTICE: Reticles will only be available for ACOG, EOTech, Hybrid and Reflex optics.)
detailed_description: From the distant future comes the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Cyborg Personalization Pack, fully-loaded with an electrotech-themed weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new Calling Card. (NOTICE: Reticles will only be available for ACOG, EOTech, Hybrid and Reflex optics.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista® SP2/Windows® 7
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz processor or better
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:AMD Radeon HD 3870 512MB or Nvidia Geforce 8800 GT 512MB or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:16 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX® 9.0C or later
